rows.label: tlk45300011_02_msg0001
rows.name:
You know you can retake the
same Merc Mission even after
you've finished it?

rows.label: tlk45300011_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I guess it makes sense. I'd never
turn down a little extra help
with making deliveries myself!

rows.label: tlk45300011_02_msg0003
rows.name:
And then there's stuff like guard
duty where they need somebody on
the job pretty much constantly.

rows.label: tlk45300011_02_msg0004
rows.name:
If you've got some Blades to spare,
give them some Merc Missions to do.
Better than having them laze around!
